original_title: Former Mayoress Rosy gets Advisor to the President post
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Former Mayoress of Colombo Rosy Senanayake was appointed as the Advisor to the President on Local Government Affairs.
The appointment was made by the President, and the appointment letter was issued by the Secretary to the President.
23 people gunned down in Sri Lanka in 2023; 239 murders in 146 days this year
